org.cmg.resp.topology
Class AbstractPort

java.lang.Object
  org.cmg.resp.topology.AbstractPort
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageReceiver, MessageSender
Direct Known Subclasses:
PortForwarder, ServerPortClient, SocketPort, VirtualPort
public abstract class AbstractPort
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageSender, MessageReceiver

An AbstractPort is used to identify a generic communication channel that nodes use to interact with each other.

Author:
Michele Loreti

getAddress

public abstract Address getAddress()
Returns port address. The address obtained by this method is attached to each message sent through the port.

Returns:
port address.
